USER_INACTIVE.message: User is inactive. Please contact the administrator or wait for further action.

USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED.message: You are not authorized to perform this action.

USER_PIN_ALREADY_SET.message: PIN has already been set. To change it, please use the reset PIN flow.

USER_ACTION_NOT_ALLOWED.message: You cannot perform this action within 1 hour of user creation.

EMAIL_ALREADY_USED.message: Email is already in use by another user.

TOKEN_EXPIRED.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

FORBIDDEN.message: You do not have permission to perform this action.

OTP_EXPIRED.message: The OTP has expired. Please request a new one.

OTP_TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS.message: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

OTP_STILL_VALID.message: OTP is still valid. Please wait before requesting a new one.

OTP_ATTEMPTS_EXCEEDED.message: Too many OTP attempts. Please try again later.

OTP_NOT_FOUND.message: No OTP found for this request.

ALREADY_EXISTS.message: A kitchen is already associated with this user.

NAME_ALREADY_USED.message: This kitchen name is already in use. Please choose another name.

NOT_FOUND.message: No kitchen found. Please create a kitchen first.

STAGE_NOT_FOUND.message: No kitchen staging found. Please create a kitchen first.

STAGE_ADDRESS_NOT_FOUND.message: No kitchen staging address found. Please create an address first.

SYNC_KITCHEN_DATA_FAILED.message: Failed to sync kitchen data. Please try again later.

SYNC_KITCHEN_ADDRESSES_FAILED.message: Failed to sync kitchen addresses. Please try again later.

CREATE_NOT_ALLOWED.message: This kitchen data cannot be added or created because it has already been submitted for approval.

UPDATE_NOT_ALLOWED.message: This kitchen cannot be edited because it has already been submitted for approval.

INVITATION_ALREADY_USED.message: This invitation has already been accepted.

MEDIA_NOT_FOUND.message: Kitchen media not found or does not belong to this kitchen.

MEDIA_DELETE_FAILED.message: Failed to delete kitchen media. Please try again later.

MEDIA_UPLOAD_NOT_ALLOWED.message: Failed to delete create media urls. Please try again later.

MEDIA_PROCESSING_FAILED.message: Media processing failed. Please try again later.

INVALID_TYPE.message: Invalid media type. Allowed types are image, video, or audio.

INVALID_CATEGORY.message: Invalid category type. Allowed categories are logo, banner, or thumbnail.

USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: User with this email or phone already exists.

USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED.message: You are not authorized to perform this action.

USER_INACTIVE.message: User is inactive. Please contact the administrator or wait for further action.

INVALID_ROLE.message: The specified role does not exist.

PERMISSION_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: Permission with this key already exists.

ALREADY_PROCESSED.message: This request has already been processed.

UNSUPPORTED_ACTION.message: The requested action is not supported.

UNSUPPORTED_ENTITY.message: The requested entity type is not supported.

FAILED.message: The request could not be completed due to an unexpected error. Please try again later.

NOT_FOUND.message: The requested resource could not be found.

NO_FIELDS_PROVIDED.message: At least one field must be provided to update.

INVALID_FIELD.message: field has invalid value or type.

INVALID_MOBILE_NUMBER_FORMAT.message: The provided mobile number is invalid.

INVALID_STATUS_FORMAT.message: The provided mobile number is invalid.

INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT.message: The provided email address is invalid.
